founders.name: Kartik Hegde
founders.title: CEO & Co-founder
founders.title_cn: 首席执行官 & 联合创始人
founders.education: Ph.D. in Computer Science, University of Illinois (2022)
founders.education_cn: 伊利诺伊大学计算机科学博士 (2022)

founders.name: Hamid Shojaei
founders.title: CTO & Co-founder
founders.title_cn: 首席技术官 & 联合创始人

agents.name: Design Intent Agent
agents.description: Infers design intent from RTL code or specifications
agents.description_cn: 从RTL代码或规范中推断设计意图

agents.name: Testbench Agent
agents.description_cn: 自动化测试平台生成和更新

agents.name: Verification Agent
agents.description: Verification tool execution, formal verification, unit simulation, UVM
agents.description_cn: 验证工具执行、形式验证、单元仿真、UVM

features.name: Natural Language Interface
features.description: Engineers can control the entire flow using natural language
features.description_cn: 工程师可使用自然语言控制整个流程

features.name: Design Intent Mental Model
features.description: Understands what the design is supposed to do

features.name: Full Verification Coverage
features.description: Formal verification, unit simulation, UVM, functional coverage
features.description_cn: 形式验证、单元仿真、UVM、功能覆盖率

customers.name: NVIDIA
customers.result: Early deployment, validated mental model approach
customers.result_cn: 早期部署，认可心智模型方法

timeline.description: ChipStack was founded in Seattle by Kartik Hegde and Hamid Shojaei
timeline.description_cn: ChipStack由Kartik Hegde和Hamid Shojaei在西雅图创立

timeline.description: Raised $7M+ from AI2 Incubator, Khosla Ventures, and other investors
timeline.description_cn: 从AI2孵化器、Khosla Ventures等投资者处获得超过700万美元融资

timeline.description: Developed Five-Agent Suite with early customers including Altera, Tenstorrent, NVIDIA
timeline.description_cn: 开发五智能体套件，早期客户包括Altera、Tenstorrent、NVIDIA

timeline.description: Acquired by Cadence Design Systems, team joins San Jose headquarters
timeline.description_cn: 被Cadence Design Systems收购，团队加入圣何塞总部

timeline.description: Technology integrated into Cadence verification suite
timeline.description_cn: 技术集成到Cadence验证套件中
